nodes.bodyText: For my education, what does this do?
🙀  good point @tvalentyn . It is unwanted leftover from testing it on another Jenkins with some additional changes in CommonJobProperties. I deleted it in recent fixup.

For testing purposes on testing Jenkins jobs were disabled.
It refers to this method:
https://jenkinsci.github.io/job-dsl-plugin/#method/javaposse.jobdsl.dsl.jobs.WorkflowJob.disabled
